meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Eitan Ginsburg Frank Lowther Jr. Bill Sloan Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2634.

td.p: Eitan Ginsburg, an executive director from Woodland Hills, California
Frank Lowther Jr., a research scientist from Los Angeles, California
Bill Sloan, a real estate broker from Mission Viejo, California (whose 3-day cash winnings total $34,000)

tr.td: WORLD CITIES
SPORTS
MAGAZINES
RED
LETTER
DAYS
